description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

St Joseph’s School, 95 Highgate Hill, Islington, London, N19 5NE

TPO Reference:

T65 – Lime of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No.38 on the plan provided
T66 – Ash of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No. 45 on the plan provided
T1 – Maple of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No. 48 on the plan provided
T4 – Birch of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No. 51 on the plan provided
T25 – Alder of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No. 71 on the plan provided
T23 – Maple of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No. 74 on the plan provided
T9– Poplar of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009 - Tree No. 87 on the plan provided
 
PO Number:

T100058

Work specifications:

1 x Lime (T65) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009
General Prune - 
Crown lift, remove deadwood, cut back from property, lights and signage, remove basal growth.
 
1 x Ash (T66) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.413) 2009
Crown reduce by up to 30%
General Prune - 
Crown lift, remove deadwood, cut back from property, lights and signage, remove basal growth.
